bit_field.name: DEFAULT_BOOT_SOURCE
bit_field.description: Primary boot source

bit_field_value.name: SECONDARY_BOOT_LOADER_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Secondary Boot loader in Bank1 IFR0 (32KB)

bit_field.name: ISP_BOOT_INTERFACE
bit_field.description: ISP boot interface

bit_field.name: RECOVERY_BOOT_SOURCE
bit_field.description: Recovery boot source

bit_field_value.name: SB3_IMAGE
bit_field_value.description: SB3 image in 1-bit SPI flash connected to FlexComm overlapped with FlexSPI A

bit_field.name: CORE_CLOCK
bit_field.description: Core Clock

bit_field.name: HEADER
bit_field.description: CMPA Header marker should be set to 0x5963

bit_field.name: FLASH_REMAP_SZ
bit_field.description: Flash remap size.This field should be written to remap field in flash.

bit_field.name: OEM_BANK1_IFR0_PROT
bit_field.description: Defines protection for Bank1_IFR0.Set RWXL = 1010 when jumping to Bank1_IFR0 address.

bit_field_value.name: RWXL_1010
bit_field_value.description: Set to RWXL = 1010 on user image exit.

bit_field_value.name: RWXL_1011
bit_field_value.description: Set to RWXL = 1011 on user image exit.

bit_field_value.name: RWXL_0011
bit_field_value.description: Set to RWXL = 0011 on user image exit.

bit_field_value.name: RWXL_0001
bit_field_value.description: Set to RWXL = 0001 on user image exit.

bit_field.name: ISP_FT_ENTRY
bit_field.description: Authentication failure

bit_field.name: ISP_PIN_ENTRY
bit_field.description: Disable ISP mode entry through pin assertion.

bit_field.name: ISP_DM_ENTRY
bit_field.description: Disable ISP mode entry through debug mailbox command.

bit_field.name: ISP_API_ENTRY
bit_field.description: Disable ISP mode entry through ROM API call. ISP mode can be entered through ROM API invocation

bit_field.name: REC_BOOT_LED
bit_field.description: Assert on recovery boot. ROM drives the GPIO pin identified by this field whenever primary boot fails and fall through to recovery boot source.

bit_field.name: ISP_BOOT_LED
bit_field.description: Assert on ISP fall through. ROM drives the GPIO pin identified by this field whenever primary boot fails and execution falls through to ISP mode.

bit_field.name: BOOT_FAIL_LED
bit_field.description: Assert on fatal errors during boot. ROM toggles the GPIO pin identified by this field whenever primary boot fails due to fatal errors before locking-up/reset. Note, use QUICK_SET_/CLR_GPIOx field to set the default level of pin.

bit_field.name: POWERDOWN_TIMEOUT_SECS
bit_field.description: Powerdown timeout:Timeout value in seconds. When a non-zero value is programmed in this field ROM uses it as idle timeout value to enter power-down state to conserve power.

bit_field.name: WDOG_TIMEOUT_COUNT
bit_field.description: WDOG timeout:Upper 16 bits of 24-bit count value in WWDT_TC register Timeout value in seconds. When a non-zero value is programmed in this field ROM configures the watch dog timer to reset the device on timeout before passing execution control to user code.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_AUTO_PROBE
bit_field.description: Quad/Octal-SPI flash auto probe feature enable

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_PROBE_TYPE
bit_field.description: Quad/Octal-SPI flash probe type.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_FLASH_TYPE
bit_field.description: Define typical Serial NOR Flash types

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_DUMMY_CYCLES
bit_field.description: Quad/Octal-SPI dummy cycles for read command.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_FREQUENCY
bit_field.description: Q/O-SPI flash interface frequency.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_ENABLE
bit_field.description: Use QSPI_RESET_PIN to reset the flash device.

bit_field_value.name: NO_RESET
bit_field_value.description: NO_RESET(O/QSPI device reset pin is not connected or available

bit_field_value.name: EN_RESET
bit_field_value.description: EN_RESET(O/QSPI device reset pin is connected to a GPIO (QSPI_RESET_PIN)

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_GPIO_PORT
bit_field.description: GPIO port number to use for O/QSPI reset function

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_GPIO_PIN
bit_field.description: GPIO pin number to use for O/QSPI reset function

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_HOLD_TIME
bit_field.description: Wait time before access to Serial Flash.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_PWR_HOLD_TIME
bit_field.description: Delay after POR before accessing Quad/Octal-SPI flash devices in addition to delay defined by FLEXSPI_HOLD TIME field.

bit_field.name: PORT_SEL
bit_field.description: Defined which FlexSPI portA/B is used for boot.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_DELAY_CELL_NUM
bit_field.description: Delay cell numbers for Flash read sampling via DQS (either internal loopback or external DQS)

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_IMAGE_OFFSET
bit_field.description: Any offset in memory mapped Q/Octal-SPI Flash area could be remapped to offset zero to support eXecute In Place (XIP) of image programmed at different offset.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_REMAP_IMAGE_SIZE
bit_field.description: Any offset in memory mapped QSPI Flash area could be remapped to offset zero to support eXecute In Place (XIP) of image programmed at different offset. This allows to build all update images with same RO base address, which are programmed at offset 0 or higher offset. QSPI_IMAGE_OFFSET field specifies the offset location of second image. QSPI_IMAGE_SIZE field specifies the size multiple to determine the size of area to be remapped.

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_1MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_1MB Size of remapped area is 1MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_2MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_2MB Size of remapped area is 2MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_3MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_3MB Size of remapped area is 3MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_4MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_4MB Size of remapped area is 4MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_5MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_5MB Size of remapped area is 5MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_6MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_6MB Size of remapped area is 6MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_7MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_7MB Size of remapped area is 7MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_8MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_8MB Size of remapped area is 8MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_9MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_9MB Size of remapped area is 9MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_10MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_10MB Size of remapped area is 10MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_11MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_11MB Size of remapped area is 11MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_12MB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_12MB Size of remapped area is 12MByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_256KB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_256KB Size of remapped area is 256KByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_512KB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_512KB Size of remapped area is 512KByte

bit_field_value.name: SIZE_768KB
bit_field_value.description: SIZE_768KB Size of remapped area is 768KByte

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_SCK_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI_SCK ISP pin.Identifies the pin to be used as SPI_SCK pin.

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_SCK_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_FLEXCOM
bit_field.description: Identifies the FlexComm used for SPI ISP mode

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_MOSI_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI_MOSI ISP pin

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_MOSI_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_MISO_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI_MISO ISP pin

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_MISO_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_SSEL_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI_SSEL ISP pin.

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_SSEL_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: REC_SPI_SSEL_X
bit_field.description: SPI chip select number.

bit_field.name: UART_RX_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default UART RX ISP pin.

bit_field.name: UART_RX_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: UART_ISP_FLEXCOM
bit_field.description: Identifies the FlexComm used for UART ISP mode.

bit_field.name: UART_TX_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default UART TX ISP pin.

bit_field.name: UART_TX_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: UART_BAUD_RATE
bit_field.description: UART baud rate.Baud rate configured during UART ISP mode.

bit_field.name: I2C_SCL_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default I2C SCL ISP pin.

bit_field.name: I2C_SCL_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot

bit_field.name: I2C_ISP_FLEXCOM
bit_field.description: Identifies the FlexComm used for I2C ISP mode

bit_field.name: I2C_SDA_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default I2C SDA ISP pin

bit_field.name: I2C_SDA_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: CAN_RX_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default CAN RX ISP pin.

bit_field.name: CAN_RX_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: CAN_ISP_FLEXCOM
bit_field.description: Identifies the FlexComm used for CAN ISP mode.

bit_field.name: CAN_TX_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default CAN TX ISP pin.

bit_field.name: CAN_TX_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: CAN_BAUD_RATE
bit_field.description: CAN baud rate.Baud rate configured during CAN ISP mode. Default: Auto baud detection.

bit_field.name: SPI_SCK_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI SCK ISP pin.

bit_field.name: SPI_SCK_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot

bit_field.name: SPI_ISP_FLEXCOM
bit_field.description: Identifies the FlexComm used for SPI ISP mode

bit_field.name: SPI_MOSI_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI MOSI ISP pin

bit_field.name: SPI_MOSI_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: SPI_MISO_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI MISO ISP pin.

bit_field.name: SPI_MISO_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot

bit_field.name: SPI_SSEL_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default SPI SSEL ISP pin

bit_field.name: SPI_SSEL_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot.

bit_field.name: ISP_SPI_SSEL_X
bit_field.description: SPI chip select number.

bit_field.name: USB_Vendor_ID
bit_field.description: USB Vendor ID

bit_field.name: USB_Product_ID
bit_field.description: USB Product ID

bit_field.name: USB0_VBUS_PIN
bit_field.description: Override default USB VBUS MISO ISP pin.

bit_field.name: USB0_VBUS_FUNC_SLOT
bit_field.description: Identifies the pin mux function slot

bit_field.name: EXT_XTAL_CLK
bit_field.description: USB PHY input clock frequency. For USB high speed PHY external XTAL input is needed. This field specifies the frequency of XTAL used on board.

bit_field.name: PRE_DIV
bit_field.description: Enable Pre-divider. Needed to support 48MHz and other high speed crystals.

bit_field.name: I2C_SLAVE_ADDR
bit_field.description: I2C slave address. A 7-bit Address used for selecting our device on shared I2C bus system.By default ROM uses 0x10 as slave address.

bit_field.name: ISP_CAN_CUST
bit_field.description: Use customer defined CAN ISP pins.

bit_field.name: ISP_SPI_CUST
bit_field.description: Use customer defined SPI ISP pins.

bit_field.name: ISP_I2C_CUST
bit_field.description: Use customer defined I2C ISP pins.

bit_field.name: ISP_UART_CUST
bit_field.description: Use customer defined UART ISP pins.

register.name: DCFG_CC_SOCU_PIN
register.description: Credential Constraints for SoC specific Use Pinned

bit_field.name: NIDEN
bit_field.description: Non-secure Non-invasive Debug Enable

bit_field.name: DBGEN
bit_field.description: Non-secure Debug Enable

bit_field.name: SPNIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure Non-invasive Debug Enable

bit_field.name: SPIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure Invasive Debug Enable

bit_field.name: DSP_DBGEN
bit_field.description: DSP Debug Enable

bit_field.name: ISP_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: ISP Boot Command Enable

bit_field.name: FA_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: FA Command Enable

bit_field.name: ME_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: Flash Mass Erase Command Enable

bit_field.name: CPU1_NIDEN
bit_field.description: Second CM33 debug enable

bit_field.name: CPU1_DBGEN
bit_field.description: Second CM33 debug

bit_field.name: UUID_CHECK
bit_field.description: UUID Check

bit_field.name: INVERSE_VALUE
bit_field.description: Inverse Value

register.name: DCFG_CC_SOCU_DFLT
register.description: Credential Constraints for SoC specific Use Debug Filter

bit_field.name: NIDEN
bit_field.description: Non Secure Non-invasive Debug Fixed State

bit_field.name: DBGEN
bit_field.description: Non-secure Debug Fixed State

bit_field.name: SPNIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure Non-invasive Debug Fixed State

bit_field.name: SPIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure Invasive Debug Fixed State

bit_field.name: DSP_DBGEN
bit_field.description: DSP Debug Fixed State

bit_field.name: ISP_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: ISP Command Fixed State

bit_field.name: FA_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: FA Command Fixed State

bit_field.name: ME_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: Flash Mass Erase Command Fixed State

bit_field.name: CPU1_NIDEN
bit_field.description: Second CM33 Debug Fixed State

bit_field.name: CPU1_DBGEN
bit_field.description: Second CM33 debug

bit_field.name: INVERSE_VALUE
bit_field.description: Inverse Value

bit_field.name: VENDOR_USAGE
bit_field.description: Vendor Usage [31:16]

bit_field.name: SEC_BOOT_EN
bit_field.description: Secure boot enforcement. This field defines the minimum image verification procedure (CRC32, CMAC, ECDSA sign).

bit_field_value.name: CRC32_IMAGES
bit_field_value.description: Only CRC32 or signed (CMAC or ECDSA) images are allowed.

bit_field_value.name: SIGNED_IMAGES
bit_field_value.description: Only Signed (CMAC or ECDSA) images are allowed.

bit_field_value.name: ECDSA_SIGNED
bit_field_value.description: Only ECDSA signed images are allowed.

bit_field.name: LP_SEC_BOOT
bit_field.description: Secure boot option for low-power wake from power-down and deep-powerdown.For PFR/ROMP do CRC check always.

bit_field_value.name: CHECK_CRC32
bit_field_value.description: CRC check for PFR and CRC32 check of active image

bit_field_value.name: CHECK_JUMP
bit_field_value.description: CRC check for PFR and jump to vector address specified in CFPA.

bit_field_value.name: CMAC_CHECK
bit_field_value.description: CRC check for PFR and CMAC check of active image

bit_field.name: ENF_CNSA
bit_field.description: Enforce CNSA

bit_field_value.name: ECC_P384_0
bit_field_value.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bit_field_value.name: ECC_P384_1
bit_field_value.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bit_field_value.name: ECC_P384_2
bit_field_value.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bit_field.name: ENF_TZM_PRESET
bit_field.description: Enforce TrustZone-M Preset

bit_field_value.name: ENFORCE_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bit_field_value.name: ENFORCE_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bit_field_value.name: ENFORCE_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bit_field.name: ITRC_ZEROIZE
bit_field.description: RAM zeroize on ITRC event. Zeroize long-term storage RAM (AO_RAM) on subsequent boot when Intrusion and Tamper control signals an intrusion event.

bit_field_value.name: PKC_RAM_ON_ITRC
bit_field_value.description: Always Zeroize PKC RAM on ITRC event only.

bit_field_value.name: PKC_RAMA_ON_ITRC
bit_field_value.description: Zeroize PKC and AO RAM on ITRC event only.

bit_field_value.name: PKC_RAMA_ALL_RESET
bit_field_value.description: Always Zeroize PKC and AO RAM on all reset boot.

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_IMG_PROT
bit_field.description: Protection of active image. This field defines protection of flash area occupied by active image. Only applicable to internal flash.

bit_field_value.name: NO_PROTECTION
bit_field_value.description: No protection after from ACL list.

bit_field_value.name: WITH_STICKY_LOCK
bit_field_value.description: Write protect active image area with sticky lock.

bit_field_value.name: NO_STICKY_LOCK
bit_field_value.description: Write protect active image area without sticky lock.

bit_field_value.name: XOM_PROTECTION
bit_field_value.description: XOM protect active image area with sticky lock.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ISP
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ISP
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ISP
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ISP
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ISP
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: FAILURE_ENF_POWER_CYC
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field_value.name: USABLE
bit_field_value.description: Usable as debug CA, image CA, FW CA, image and FW key.

bit_field_value.name: IMG_BOOT_FW
bit_field_value.description: Usable as image (boot and FW) CA only.

bit_field_value.name: DEBUG_BOOT_FW_IMG

bit_field_value.name: IMG_FW_UPDATE_KEY

bit_field_value.name: FW_UPDATE_IMG_KEY

bit_field.description: Include Customer factory area (including keys) in DICE computation.

bit_field.name: REG0_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: Region 0 Erase Check Enable

bit_field.name: REG1_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: Region 1 Erase Check Enable

bit_field.name: REG2_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: Region 2 Erase Check Enable

bit_field.name: REG3_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: Region 3 Erase Check Enable

bit_field.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX0
bit_field.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 0 settings.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. But no erase check.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX1
bit_field.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 1 settings.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. But no erase check.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX2
bit_field.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 2 settings.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. But no erase check.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field.name: NPX_LOCK_CTX3
bit_field.description: Lock onchip flash NPX PRINCE context 3 settings.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_NO_ERASE_CHECK
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. But no erase check.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_0
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

bit_field_value.name: LOCKED_ERASE_CHECK_EN_1
bit_field_value.description: Region is locked. Erase check enabled. Flash programming ROM API enforces the erase check. When erase check is enabled all sectors selected in the context should be erased together and only contiguous sectors can be selected in context bitmap.

register.name: NPX_CTX0_WD0
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 0 (sectors 0 -31)

register.name: NPX_CTX0_WD1
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 0 (sectors 32 - 63)

register.name: NPX_CTX1_WD0
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 1 (sectors 0 -31)

register.name: NPX_CTX1_WD1
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 1 (sectors 32 - 63)

register.name: NPX_CTX2_WD0
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 2 (sectors 0 -31)

register.name: NPX_CTX2_WD1
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 2 (sectors 32 - 63)

register.name: NPX_CTX3_WD0
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 3 (sectors 0 -31)

register.name: NPX_CTX3_WD1
register.description: Bitmap mask for NPX Prince context 3 (sectors 32 - 63)

bit_field.name: GCM_MODE
bit_field.description: GCM mode enable.

bit_field_value.name: ENABLE_CTR_MODE
bit_field_value.description: Region is enabled in CTR mode

bit_field_value.name: ENABLE_GCM_MODE
bit_field_value.description: Region is enabled in GCM mode.

bit_field.name: AHBERR_DIS
bit_field.description: Disable AHB bus error. If GCM authentication fails generates bus error or not.

alias.value: SHIFT_RIGHT:COUNT=8;DESC=ROM only uses upper 24bits to address IPED region. In config file use full 32b address.

bit_field.name: LOCK_EN
bit_field.description: Lock the external PRINCE context settings.

alias.value: SHIFT_RIGHT:COUNT=8;DESC=ROM only uses upper 24bits to address IPED region. In config file use full 32b address.

register.description: Quick Clear to Drive GPIO 0 port pins low

bit_field.description: CMPA_CRC32 for address range 0x0200_4000 - 0x0200_41EB
